name: Not Asteroids
description:
Hello! My name's Martin and I made this game as part of the Ubisoft Game Jam 2019. The theme was "designing above confrontation", so I thought it would be fun to take a classic arcade game and try not only to remove confrontational aspects of the design but entirely reverse them.

Not Asteroids is therefore not a game about blasting space-rocks apart, but instead about bringing them together to create something new.
